name: Sneaky Boi
description:
Sneaky Boi is a game prototype created in 3 hours. where the player must sneak past guards to pass the level. If the player is found out, they are shot and captured.

Theme: Unseen

Constraints: Non-violent (The enemies use dart guns! not real ones..)

Controls!

Arrow keys to move

A and D to roll

Z to jump

Z to wall jump (while sliding on a wall)

Down arrow key and Z to pass though a platform

You cannot attack!!

Platformer engine created by ZBG
